verses.roman:
kuśadhvajas tasya putras
tato dharmadhvajo nṛpaḥ
dharmadhvajasya dvau putrau
kṛtadhvaja-mitadhvajau

synonyms: kuśadhvajaḥ—Kuśadhvaja; tasya—of Śīradhvaja; putraḥ—son; tataḥ—from him; dharmadhvajaḥ—Dharmadhvaja; nṛpaḥ—the king; dharmadhvajasya—from this Dharmadhvaja; dvau—two; putrau—sons; kṛtadhvaja-mitadhvajau—Kṛtadhvaja and Mitadhvaja.
translation: The son of Śīradhvaja was Kuśadhvaja, and the son of Kuśadhvaja was King Dharmadhvaja, who had two sons, namely Kṛtadhvaja and Mitadhvaja.
